references.paper_title: A family of algorithms for approximate Bayesian inference
references.reason: This paper introduces Expectation Propagation (EP), the core algorithm the current work builds upon and improves.
This paper introduces Power EP, a variant of EP that is referenced and built upon in the current work.

references.paper_title: Robust Gaussian process regression with a Student-t likelihood
references.reason: This paper addresses the robustness of Gaussian Processes, which is relevant to the stability improvements sought in the current work.

references.paper_title: Expectation propagation as a way of life: A framework for Bayesian inference on partitioned data
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of EP and its applications, particularly in handling MC noise; this is directly addressed in the current work.

references.paper_title: Distributed Bayesian learning with stochastic natural gradient expectation propagation and the posterior server
references.reason: This paper introduces Stochastic Natural Gradient EP (SNEP), a key related method that is compared to the newly proposed algorithms.
